title: (x) 2 thin sans in Rotman Magazine, Fall 07 - Apex Sans/New, Galaxie Polaris {Yves, Akira}
content:
Can you help identify this font?  
It was found in Rotman Magazine, Fall 07 issue.  
I thought it might be FF Clan, but the "s" is different.

Credits to Underline Studio for nice design on the Fall 07 issue.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/identify_me_plz_5963.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lowercase_4308.png)
author: chiranit

comments.content: The top one is Apex Sans (or New, lemmecheck...)
I guess [Apex New](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022630/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexNew/mudTyper+Weights/), I can't spot the differences very well in these light weights.
